## How to Reach IIT(ISM) Dhanbad

::::::::: {.grid .text-center .travel-section}
:::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4 .travel-card}
::: icon-box
<i class="bi bi-train-front-fill"></i>
:::

### By Rail

**Dhanbad Jn.** (2.8 km away) is the largest station in the state with direct trains to almost every major city. Taxis, Autos, and Ola cabs are available 24/7.
::::

:::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4 .travel-card}
::: icon-box
<i class="bi bi-bus-front-fill"></i>
:::

### By Road

Connected via **NH-18 & NH-19**. Seamless bus connectivity to Ranchi, Kolkata, Jamshedpur, and Bokaro.
::::

:::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4 .travel-card}
::: icon-box
<i class="bi bi-airplane-fill"></i>
:::

### By Air

Nearest Airports: \* **Durgapur (RDP):** 85 km \* **Deoghar (DGH):** 110 km \* **Ranchi (IXR):** 140 km \* **Kolkata (CCU):** 269 km

## Places to See Nearby

::::::::::::::::::::: grid
::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}

::: tour-header
Deoghar & Baidyanath Dham
:::

<p><strong>Distance:</strong> 120 km (3 hrs)</p>

<p>Home to the revered Baba Baidyanath Jyotirlinga. Visit Trikut Pahar for panoramic views and the intricate Naulakha Temple.</p>
::::
:::::

::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
:::: tour-card
::: tour-header
Maithon Lake
:::

<p><strong>Distance:</strong> 48 km (1 hr)</p>

<p>A serene reservoir on the Barakar River. Perfect for boating, fishing, and visiting the ancient Kalyaneshwari Temple and Deer Park.</p>
::::
:::::

::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
:::: tour-card
::: tour-header
Parasnath Hills
:::

<p><strong>Distance:</strong> 50 km (45 mins)</p>

<p>Jharkhand's highest peak (1,350m). A significant Jain pilgrimage site (Shikharji) adorned with ancient temples.</p>
::::
:::::

::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
:::: tour-card
::: tour-header
Bodh Gaya
:::

<p><strong>Distance:</strong> 208 km (3 hrs)</p>

<p>UNESCO World Heritage Site where Lord Buddha attained enlightenment. Features the Mahabodhi Temple and the Bodhi Tree.</p>
::::
:::::

::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
:::: tour-card
::: tour-header
Ajodhya Hills (Purulia)
:::

<p><strong>Distance:</strong> 101 km (3 hrs)</p>

<p>A picturesque retreat with waterfalls like Bamni Falls, lush forests, and dams. Ideal for nature lovers.</p>
::::
:::::

::::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6}
:::: tour-card
::: tour-header
Ranchi City
:::

<p><strong>Distance:</strong> 150 km (4 hrs)</p>

<p>The city of waterfalls. Famous for Dassam Falls, Ranchi Lake, and the historic Jagannath Temple.</p>
